thread.title_full: Last Call Would Extend From 2am To 4am Under New CA Law | Alex | Y93

title: Last Call Would Extend From 2am To 4am Under New CA Law | Alex | Y93
text:
Last Call Would Extend From 2am To 4am Under New CA Law posted by Alex Gervasi - share 
This could be a dream come true. 
True hero state Senator Scott Weiner, proposed a bill that would extend last call from 2am to 4am in certain counties and cities in California. 
I'm introducing legislation to create more local control around how late alcohol can be served - specifically, to allow... 
I was just in NYC a few weeks ago and took full advantage of the clubs being open until 4am. I raged. 
You know what this will also mean? Brunch will go LATER on Saturday and Sundays. 
Please make this happen. Tweets by @AlexontheMic What's up? I'm Alex! So I guess I'll tell you a little bit about myself. I grew up in South Jersey (10 minutes from Philly) and went to school a few minutes from Lexington, Kentucky. Growing up I always wanted to be on the air. What's better than talking about and listening to music for a living? Sounds like a pretty good job to me. I'm here to to provide some good music for your ears and keep you informed on all the latest things happening around here. Sound good? Follow me on Twitter/Instagram: @alexonthemic Contact
